Articles.Content:
Hi,

Just wanted to let everyone know, we\'ve temporarily disabled forum attachments, in order to carry out the move to the new server (we are moving to a larger one because the one we have can\'t handle the traffic anymore).

So to not require a complete shutdown of the forum, we\'ve disabled any new attachments for the time being, until the move is complete. That should hopefully happen on Monday.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, and thank you for your understanding.

Cheers
Is there any ETA on enabling attachments back?
Lol, it would be funny if you discovered that after the holiday.
